https://tmrev.io/movie/1024379-Cursed Urban Legend : Purple Mirror 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nJTU6BIEiWqMCCmHEz0bGDKB19L.jpg A horror that depicts the urban legend "Purple Mirror" on an overwhelming scale. Kitagawa Tomoko, who celebrated her 20th birthday, is walking through the city when she suddenly wanders into a dimly lit forest. While walking around in a panic, a bloodied man jumped out of the ruins in the back of the forest and died in front of him. Cursed Urban Legend : Purple Mirror
